mapper.insert: insert into member(id, password, nickname, email, phoneNum, profile, address, regdate, delflg, auth, point) values(#{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{phoneNum}, #{profile}, #{address}, now(), 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
mapper.update: update member set id=#{id}, password=#{password}, nickname=#{nickname}, email=#{email}, phoneNum=#{phoneNum}, address=#{address}, profile=#{profile} where memberSeq=#{memberSeq}
